name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Angular Engineer with 13+ years of experience in developing high-performance applications, specializing in **Angular**, **TypeScript**, and **Tailwind**. Adept in creating responsive web designs optimized for mobile compatibility and user experience. Proven track record in Agile and Scrum methodologies, fostering collaborative team environments.
Skilled in performance optimization, debugging, and crafting technical documentation that enhances project clarity and collaboration. Strong problem-solving abilities and meticulous attention to detail ensure the delivery of robust and efficient solutions.
With extensive hands-on experience in both frontend and backend technologies like **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **Flutter**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, I have successfully built AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Proficient in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and maintaining CI/CD pipelines while adhering to compliance standards such as HIPAA and PCI DSS.
